achievements: Hosted 'The Tonight Show' for over three decades
Known for his wit, observational humor, and celebrity interviews
Considered one of the most influential figures in late-night television history
Authored the influential book Silent Spring, which raised awareness about the dangers of pesticides
Considered a founder of the modern environmental movement
Explored and mapped vast areas of the American West.
Played a key role in conflicts with Native American tribes.
Served as a guide and scout for the U.S. Army.
